precondition: The Windows XP desktop is visible.
The right-click context menu is open on the Windows XP desktop.
expected_results: The context menu will close, and the 'Display Properties' window will open.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Appearance" tab is selected.
expected_results: The "Display Properties" window will display the "Screen Saver" settings. A new button labeled "Power..." will appear at the bottom of the "Monitor power" section.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is selected.
action: Click the down arrow button next to the 'Screen saver' dropdown menu.
expected_results: A list of available screen savers will appear.

precondition: The 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu within the 'Display Properties' window is open.
action: Click on the 'None' item in the 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu.
expected_results: The 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu will close.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is selected.
action: Move the mouse cursor over the "Power..." button.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is active.
action: Click the down arrow of the "Power schemes" dropdown menu.
expected_results: A list of available power schemes will appear.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' window is open and the 'Always On' power scheme is selected.
action: Click on the 'Keep your computer up to date' dialog box in the bottom left corner of the screen.
expected_results: The 'Keep your computer up to date' dialog box will move to the foreground and become focused.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Always On" power scheme is selected.
action: Click the down arrow next to the "Turn off monitor" drop-down menu.
expected_results: The "Turn off monitor", "Turn off hard disks", "System standby", and "System hibernates" drop-down menus will expand, displaying a list of time options.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is selected. The "System hibernates" dropdown menu is expanded.
action: Click the "Never" option in the "System hibernates" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "System hibernates" dropdown menu will close.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' window is open and the 'Power Schemes' tab is active. The 'Power schemes' dropdown menu displays 'Always On'. The 'Settings for Always On power scheme' section should have 'Turn off monitor,' 'Turn off hard disks,' 'System standby,' and 'System hibernates' all set to 'Never'.
action: Click the 'Apply' button at the bottom of the window.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open with the "Always On" power scheme selected and the desired settings configured.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will close, and you will be returned to the "Display Properties" window.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is selected.
action: Click the 'OK' button at the bottom of the window.
